title: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.--Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out. --John Wooden
head: Motivational

title: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong. --Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary. --Jim Rohn
head: Motivational

title: Trust because you are willing to accept the risk, not because it's safe or certain. --Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life--think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success. --Swami Vivekananda
head: Motivational

title: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them. --Walt Disney
head: Motivational

title: Good things come to people who wait, but better things come to those who go out and get them. --Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: If you do what you always did, you will get what you always got. --Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm. --Winston Churchill
head: Motivational

title: Just when the caterpillar thought the world was ending, he turned into a butterfly. --Proverb
head: Motivational

title: Successful entrepreneurs are givers and not takers of positive energy. --Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: Whenever you see a successful person you only see the public glories, never the private sacrifices to reach them. --Vaibhav Shah
head: Motivational

title: Opportunities don't happen, you create them. --Chris Grosser
head: Motivational

title: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value. --Albert Einstein
head: Motivational

title: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people. --Eleanor Roosevelt
head: Motivational

title: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work. --Thomas A. Edison
head: Motivational

title: If you don't value your time, neither will others. Stop giving away your time and talents--start charging for it. --Kim Garst
head: Motivational

title: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him. --David Brinkley
head: Motivational

title: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent. --Eleanor Roosevelt
head: Motivational

title: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one's destiny to do, and then do it. --Henry Ford
head: Motivational

title: If you're going through hell keep going. --Winston Churchill
head: Motivational

title: The ones who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do. --Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: Don't raise your voice, improve your argument. --Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise. --Oscar Wilde
head: Motivational

title: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away. --Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success. --Bruce Feirstein
head: Motivational

title: When you stop chasing the wrong things, you give the right things a chance to catch you. --Lolly Daskal
head: Motivational

title: When you stop chasing the wrong things, you give the right things a chance to catch you. --Lolly Daskal
head: Motivational

title: I believe that the only courage anybody ever needs is the courage to follow your own dreams. --Oprah Winfrey
head: Motivational

title: No masterpiece was ever created by a lazy artist. --Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: Happiness is a butterfly, which when pursued, is always beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you. --Nathaniel Hawthorne
head: Motivational

title: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough. --Albert Einstein
head: Motivational

title: Blessed are those who can give without remembering and take without forgetting. --Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: Do one thing every day that scares you. --Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: What's the point of being alive if you don't at least try to do something remarkable. --Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself. --Lolly Daskal
head: Motivational

title: Nothing in the world is more common than unsuccessful people with talent. --Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: Knowledge is being aware of what you can do. Wisdom is knowing when not to do it. --Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: Your problem isn't the problem. Your reaction is the problem. --Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: You can do anything, but not everything. --Anonymous
head: Motivational

title: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower. --Steve Jobs
head: Motivational

title: There are two types of people who will tell you that you cannot make a difference in this world: those who are afraid to try and those who are afraid you will succeed. --Ray Goforth
head: Motivational

title: Thinking should become your capital asset, no matter whatever ups and downs you come across in your life. --A.P.J. Abdul Kalam
head: Motivational

title: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have. --Thomas Jefferson
head: Motivational

title: The starting point of all achievement is desire. --Napoleon Hill
head: Motivational

title: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out. --Robert Collier
head: Motivational

title: If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. As of this second, quit doing less-than-excellent work. --Thomas J. Watson
head: Motivational

title: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone. --Michael John Bobak
head: Motivational

title: You may only succeed if you desire succeeding; you may only fail if you do not mind failing. --Philippos
head: Motivational
